title: Astrophotography with the Pixel 6 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro, and a DSLR
description: In this episode of Full Frame, Becca Farsace took cameras from Sony, Canon, Fuji, Apple, and Google out to Colorado in search of the perfect photo of the night sky. The right shot has less to do with the right camera and more to do with escaping all the light polluting your frame.
